paper_abstract: We study the expected self-stabilization time of Herman's algorithm. For N processors the lower bound is 4/27N(2) (0.148N(2)), and an upper bound of 0.64N(2) is presented in Kiefer et al. (2011) [4]. In this paper we give a tighter upper bound 0.521N(2). (C) 2013 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: A tighter bound for the self-stabilization time in Herman's algorithm
